https://tmrev.io/movie/725000-Anodyne 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eO2ZaKUOXKoW7OaQBKeIGARLkkt.jpg Mixing old tech with new, these lyrical abstractions explore red-gold color fields created with photograms (direct exposure of film without cameras), then animated through 16mm rephotography and digital manipulation. Soothing and melancholy, Wills works in the aleatory-painterly tradition of Brakhage, but with sound: the tracks consist of classical music, spoken word, and altered bits of everyday noises. Floral images link her work to Victorian embroidery and other womanly parlor arts. (Ed Halte) Anodyne
